# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  polyg.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} polyg.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP polyg.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} polyg.cir ${OutputDataDir}/POLYG/polyg.cir.prn polyg.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED polyg.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} polyg.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP polyg.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} polyg.cir ${OutputDataDir}/POLYG/polyg.cir.prn polyg.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED polyg.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}POLYG/polyg.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
